title: Harrowing Horrors II: Shades of the Abyss
description: Dare you to look into the Abyss?There are things never to be looked upon with human eyes. They crack the seams of sanity. When viewed, they expose the shallow depths of the human soul.Shades of the Abyss is such a book, and its pages hold a truth to the world that the human mind cannot bear.Would you read such a book?Horror Stories for Adults inspiried by the Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark series!Peek inside for six Harrowing Horror reads from top writing talent including J.Z. Foster, Chad Lutzke and RJ Roles
author: J.Z. Foster
